problem.markdown:
>>Rules to dictate the running of a factory… <<
[x] Proliferate when a system is not well understood. [ ] Do not need to take into account set up times. [x] Can lead to unexpected, and undesirable behavior when the system is not well understood. [ ] Should always treat the the orders of the highest priority customer.
[Explanation] See video 3 (slide #20). [Explanation]

choiceresponse.label: Rules to dictate the running of a factory…

checkboxgroup.choice: Proliferate when a system is not well understood.
Do not need to take into account set up times.
Can lead to unexpected, and undesirable behavior when the system is not well understood.
Should always treat the the orders of the highest priority customer.
